messages.subject: BIG surfaces for art WAS RE: The little problems with toddlers
messages.msgSnippet: **I used to put large paper up on the wall, from rolls. Or large sides from fridge boxes...** Yeah! Sometimes, it s really cool to have a great big surface to
messages.messageBody:
**I used to put large paper up on the wall, from rolls. Or large sides from
fridge boxes...**

Yeah! Sometimes, it's really cool to have a great big surface to draw on. I
found that if I drop into the local supermarket shortly before the huge window
posters are going to be changed and ask for them, the manager is usually happy
to let us have them if I'll pick them up within a few hours so they're not
taking up storage space. The backs offer acres of clean white surface for BIG
art. I've also gotten large poster board size card posters from restaurants.

Deborah in IL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
